1644770.name: Lucinda Green's Equestrian Challenge
1644770.description:
Tack up, it's time to ride!

Create the perfect horse, who will be your partner in practice & competition. Care for your horse as you feed, groom & train to perfect your skills. The more you train together the better you will perform, as you win your way to prestigious international events comprising Show Jumping, Dressage and Cross Country.

• Multiple difficulty levels for players of all ages

• Four officially licensed Grand-Slam Equestrian events: Badminton, Burghley, Adelaide, and Kentucky

• Customise your rider and horse with thousands of combinations to create your own unique duo

• Hundreds of unlockable items, including clothes, rosettes and prizes
1644770.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
